resources.string: File does not exist or failed to be downloaded
This attachment contains a dangerous file. Unable to download.
Unable to reach server. Please check network settings.
Unable to reach server. Please check network settings and try again.
This attachment contains a dangerous file. Unable to download.
The requested file is too large
You need to download all attachments before you can send the message normally.
No response from server after %1$d seconds. Please try again later.
Server error. Please try again later.
Username or password is incorrect. Please check your account and password settings.
Unable to verify security certificate. Please try again later.
Phone storage is insufficient. Please free up some space and try again.
Internal app error. Please try again later.
Failed to authenticate %s. Please verify that your account and password are correct
The forwarded attachments cannot be downloaded due to network issues.
Containing files not downloaded or already deleted.
(The mailbox loads slowly on POP3, please wait patiently)
This message is associated with a calendar event. Delete it?
There is already one draft message for this meeting event. Use the body of the newly edited memo to overwrite this message?
Download completed, unable to cancel downloading
Download cancellation is not supported under the POP3 protocol
No network connection. Check network settings
Connection timed out. Please try again later.
Do not send reminders for new messages of this session
Unable to attach files larger than %1$s.
Unable to attach one or more files. Limit %1$s.
Unable to attach files. Limit reached (%1$s).
At least one recipient is required.
Use the following account to send email:
No apps found able to open this attachment.
Unable to download. Tap to retry.
Inbox is empty! Time for a break.
Sorry! No results related to %1$s were found.
Not a single piece of junk or spam found!
Your Trash is empty. Check again once you have deleted some emails.
Sync this folder to see conversations
"Account is not set to auto sync. Tap "Sync now to sync email once or tap Sync settings" to change this account's sync frequency."
Unable to move content that belong to multiple accounts.
Device storage insufficient, unable to sync.
Stop auto showing images from recipients for whom email images were previously allowed.
Display next to names in conversations list
Tap and hold a conversation to select it, then continue selecting other conversations.
Any changes made to apps and accounts (not only Gmail) will be synced online, to your other devices and your %1$s.
Only send to people in my contacts
Please add message subject and content
Auto scale email content to fit screen size
This action will clear your entire search history.
Swipe left or right to switch emails
This will display as your name when sending emails
Removing this account will also delete any emails, contacts and other synced data from this phone.

Some apps will use this account. To remove this account, you need to restore this phone to factory default settings (all user information will be deleted). Go to Settings > Backup and restore to complete this action.
Download the rest of the email
According to Google’s requirements, you need to enter your password on the Google authorization page.
You need to manually refresh the following folders to receive new messages. Once enabled, you will be notified when there are new messages.
Account authentication failed. Please check your email account settings.
Network connection timed out. Please check your network settings.
请参考163邮箱开启服务的方式。
请参考QQ邮箱开启服务的方式。
Allow this app to read email attachments.
Allow this app to access email database, including inbox and sent folders, account name and password.
Moving emails is not supported by POP3 accounts.
Unable to move emails that belong to multiple accounts.
Unable to move emails in the Drafts, Outbox and Sent folders.
"You must first download this message's attachments before forwarding."
Email address or password is incorrect
It only takes a few steps to set up your account.
Enter a valid email address and password.
This email account is already connected
Password includes spaces. Many servers do not support passwords with spaces.
You have set %1$s as %2$s, but it may be %3$s
Account setup complete. You are ready to send and receive emails!

An error occurred while setting up the account
Please confirm username, password and account settings.
Unable to securely connect to server.
Exchange certificate required. Connect to server via exchange certificate?
Server response includes an error message. Please check account name and password and try again.
TLS required, but server does not support TLS.
Security error, unable to connect to server.
Server address is incorrect or email service does not support this version of email server protocol.
You do not have permission to access this server. For more details, please contact your administrator.
"The server %s requires you to allow remote access to some security functions on your Android device. Complete this account's setup?"
"Your Android device does not support this server's requested security functions, including: %s"
Unable to change username. To add another account, please select add account.
Warning: Revoking device management permissions for the app Email will also revoke that permission for all email accounts, emails, contacts, calendar events and other data.
%s is requesting to update your security settings.
Account %s cannot be synced due to security requirements.
Account %s needs to update your security settings.
Account %s has changed its security settings. No further actions are required.
Unable to fulfill required security policies
The server %s requires you to allow remote access to some security functions on your Android device.
%s is requesting to change your lock screen PIN and password.
Lock screen password will soon expire
Your lock screen PIN or password has expired.
Lock screen password will soon expire
Please change your lock screen PIN or password soon, otherwise the system will clear data from %s. Change now?
Data from %s has been cleared from the device. You can change your lock screen PIN or password to recover the data. Change now?
Username or password associated with %s is incorrect. Fix now?
Unable to log into %s; server message: %s. Do you need to update your username and/or password?

Some Plus accounts support POP access and allow this connection. If your email address and password are correct and you still cannot log in, the paid Plus service may not have been enabled. Please open your browser and obtain the necessary access permissions.
Please visit the T-Online website to create a password and select POP3 before setting up this email account.
